name: Oreo Ice Cream
author: Suzanne Eftink
instructions: Crush package of Oreo cookies. Mix with melted butter and pat into a 9 x 13 pan. Place in freezer for 15-20 minutes to harden. Slice softened ice cream and place on top of Oreos and smooth out. Keep in freezer. Can spread caramel and pecans over the top.
